BNC User Reference Guide

<occupation>

occupation contains an informal description of a person's trade, profession or occupation.
Class model.persStateLike att.datable att.editLike att.naming
Declaration 
element occupation { att.editLike.attribute.resp, macro.phraseSeq }
Attributes
(Global attributes and those inherited from [att.datable att.editLike att.naming ] )
Example
 <occupation
xmlns:xaira="http://www.xaira.org/ns/1.0/spec"
xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0">student</occupation>
Module namesdates
